description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Strategize and position falling cards to create the best 5-card poker hand you can in each row.  Make a valid poker hand and the row clears, scoring points.
description.short: Strategize and position falling cards to create the best 5-card poker hand you can in each row.  Make a valid poker hand and the row clears, scoring points.
